title: Issues with joining games.

replies.body: Hmmmm do me a favor and try [**updating your firewall exceptions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3) to be sure they aren't blocking your network from accessing our servers. If that doesn't help, also update your DNS settings to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4 to see if that gets you a smoother connection. Let me know if those steps aren't helping at all and we can try a couple other things!
I'm having the same issue...  any help would be appreciated.. Sometimes i can connect back into the game, other times it just says i cannot reconnect and gives me a bugsplat. Help!
Were you able to try those firewall exceptions as well?

Alrighty, go ahead and try the steps we have listed [**over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115005275568) as well. Those bugsplats can be caused by a wide variety of different things so it can be hard to pinpoint what's going wrong sometimes. 

If checking for driver updates and such doesn't help either, be sure to shoot a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our techs with your game logs so they can take a closer look.
